artist: Designer: John Moyr Smith; Manufacturer: Minton and Company
creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council
description: Rim decorated with gold and black with zigzags, circles enclosing geometric designs and foliage; multicolored interior decorated with man wearing flowing togalike garment with sets of 4 circles and black trim sitting on a stool gesturing with PR hand and PL hand on hip; Greco-Roman interior
markings: \'The Guest****[Greek inscription]\', in black, below rim at top of bowl; \'[symbol and sideways \'S\']/MINTONS\', stamped into glaze on bottom; \'MINTONS [on a ribbon over a globe, topped with a crown]/ T.GOODE & CO [on a ribbon]/LONDON.\', in pink, on bottom
title: "The Guest" plate
